inspect_utils¶

Functions¶

def getMayaVersion()

def getOpenMayaVersion()

def getPythonVersion()

def getQtBinding()

def getQtVersion()

def isStudentVersion()

Description¶

Inspect application information for the current Maya session.

msTools.core.maya.inspect_utils.getMayaVersion()¶
Returns:str – The version of the current Maya session.
msTools.core.maya.inspect_utils.getOpenMayaVersion()¶
Returns:int – The API version used by the current Maya session.
msTools.core.maya.inspect_utils.getPythonVersion()¶
Returns:(int, int, int) – A three-element tuple holding Python version data for the current Maya session.
  1. Major version.
  2. Minor version.
  3. Micro version.
msTools.core.maya.inspect_utils.getQtBinding()¶
Returns:str – The Qt binding used by the current Maya session. Possible values are PySide, PySide2, PyQt4, PyQt5.
msTools.core.maya.inspect_utils.getQtVersion()¶
Returns:(int, int, int) – A three-element tuple holding Qt version data for the current Maya session.
  1. Major version.
  2. Minor version.
  3. Micro version.
msTools.core.maya.inspect_utils.isStudentVersion()¶
Returns:bool – Whether the user is running a student version of Maya.
